title: What Hath the Internet Wrought?  Don’t Forget the Links
post: Out of the urls of babes – or something like that.
author: John Klotz

title: What Hath the Internet Wrought?  Don’t Forget the Links
post: Awesome, but why is it on a Shroud blog?
author: Andy Weiss

title: What Hath the Internet Wrought?  Don’t Forget the Links
post: I had just removed 116 attempts by bots to insert spam-like comments into the blog, mostly Christmastime ads for online gambling, baldness remedies and the like. Did you know that Waste Management, Inc. is selling gift certificates for trash removal. What a thoughtful gift! This caught my eye and I completely lost control of my sensibilities; call it an insanity break, if you will. Such foolishness comes with the territory.
author: Dan

title: What Hath the Internet Wrought?  Don’t Forget the Links
post:
Dan,
I think this is a magnificent post even if off message,
That a child who still believes in Santa includes the URL for the gift is beyond precious. It boggles the mind. I wonder if NSA was watching?
author: John Klotz
